page.title: 14 POPULATION
page.content: In 1982 we took a census of those within the village of Sapperton and we think very little has changed now. There were 5 pre school children, 27 Scholars (some at the Village School and some at the Cirencester Comprehensive School, called 'Deer Park'), 76 workers and 40 OAPs making 148 persons in all. Our population has dropped a lot since the census of 1851, when we had 56 pre school children, 84 Scholars all at the Village School, 224 workers and 15 retired persons, who included 6 paupers making 379 people living in Sapperton then.
